node.text:
If a love-filled weekend away has long been on the charts for you, then this is the ideal time for it! This Valentines, plan a romantic escape to a beach haven. While at The Raviz Kovalam, just leave it to us to curate a staycation experience & a tantalizing dinner for you & your beloved.
